#### Childress TX - A Great Place to Stay and Play

#### We are serious about family fun.

[Rodeo Arena](https://www.cityofchildress.com/mashburn-event-center)

[Fair Park](https://www.cityofchildress.com/culture-recreation)

[Mashburn Event Center](https://www.cityofchildress.com/mashburn-event-center)

[ATV Park](https://www.cityofchildress.com/culture-recreation)

[Main Street & Chamber](https://www.cityofchildress.com/culture-recreation)

Community Events

Fair Park

Our Fair Park Complex now includes a newly built, state-of--the-art, Event Center and Rodeo Arena.  Fair Park is also where you will find the City Auditorium which may be used for hosting events.  Public pool, disc golf, playgrounds, hike and bike trail, fishing, ample picnic space and two open air facilities: Fair Park Pavilion and The Rotary Bowl are all found at our beautiful Fair Park.  If you are passing through in an RV be sure to check out the RV Campground, also in Fair Park.

[ATV Park](https://www.cityofchildress.com)

Childress ATV Park offers maintained red-dirt off road trails and track.  Just outside of town, and with plenty of space for your toys, gear, and RV hookups.  We are proud to offer OHV tags and fun times twelve months out of the year.

[Stoney Ridge Golf Course](https://www.cityofchildress.com/golf)

At Stoney Ridge Golf Course we are proud to offer a Municipal Golf Course with: beautifully kept grounds, greens, updated facilities and tasty bistro on-site, Grill on the Green.  The course is playable all year long, and many tournaments offered.  Further your enjoyment and submit an application for a Country Club Membership.  This grants you access to a private pool, bar, and stately Ballroom.

​

[Main Street & Chamber](http://childress-chamber.com)

Through partnerships with Childress Main Street & Childress Chamber of Commerce we are pleased to offer many annual events.  Check the Event Calendar for more information.

​

​

​

If you are visiting us we would encourage you to visit one of our [11 hotels](http://cityofchildress.com/chamber-of-commerce/business-directory/) to experience some of our down-home hospitality.
